# iosxr_policy_map_pbr (Data Source)

This data source can read the Policy Map PBR configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_policy_map_pbr" "example" {
  policy_map_name = "PM-PBR"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `policy_map_name` (String) Name of the policymap

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `classes` (Attributes List) PBR policy-map (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--classes))
- `description` (String) Set description for this policy-map
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.

<a id="nestedatt--classes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `classes`

Read-Only:

- `decapsulate_gre` (Boolean) Decapsulate GRE packet
- `drop` (Boolean) Drop the packet
- `name` (String) Name of the class-map
- `police_rate_unit` (String) Unit of Committed Information Rate
- `police_rate_value` (Number) Value of Committed Information Rate
- `redirect_ipv4_default_route` (Boolean) Forward to the default nexthop
- `redirect_ipv4_nexthop1_address` (String) IPv4 Nexthop address
- `redirect_ipv4_nexthop1_vrf` (String) Enter specific VRF Name for this nexthop
- `redirect_ipv4_nexthop2_address` (String) IPv4 Nexthop address
- `redirect_ipv4_nexthop2_vrf` (String) Enter specific VRF Name for this nexthop
- `redirect_ipv4_nexthop3_address` (String) IPv4 Nexthop address
- `redirect_ipv4_nexthop3_vrf` (String) Enter specific VRF Name for this nexthop
- `redirect_ipv6_default_route` (Boolean) Forward to the default nexthop
- `redirect_ipv6_nexthop1_address` (String) IPv6 Nexthop address
- `redirect_ipv6_nexthop1_vrf` (String) Enter specific VRF Name for this nexthop
- `redirect_ipv6_nexthop2_address` (String) IPv6 Nexthop address
- `redirect_ipv6_nexthop2_vrf` (String) Enter specific VRF Name for this nexthop
- `redirect_ipv6_nexthop3_address` (String) IPv6 Nexthop address
- `redirect_ipv6_nexthop3_vrf` (String) Enter specific VRF Name for this nexthop
- `redirect_nexthop_route_target_as_format` (String) AS number
- `set_dscp` (String) Set DSCP
- `set_forward_class` (Number) Set forward class
- `type` (String) The type of class-map
